author: Anton Petrov
description:
Support this channel on Patreon to help me make this a full time job: https://www.patreon.com/whatdamath (Unreleased videos, extra footage, DMs, no ads)
Alternatively, PayPal donations can be sent here: http://paypal.me/whatdamath
Get a Wonderful Person Tee: https://teespring.com/stores/whatdamath
More cool designs are on Amazon: https://amzn.to/3QFIrFX

Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about an experiment that tries to challenge 2nd law of thermodynamics and the Carnot theorem of heat engines by using quantum machines
Links:
http://science.org/doi/10.1126/sciadv.adw8462
https://journals.aps.org/prl/abstract/10.1103/PhysRevLett.130.240401
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quantum_heat_engines
Peterson et al. https://journals.aps.org/prl/abstract/10.1103/PhysRevLett.123.240601 
Quantum videos:
https://youtu.be/0KSB8_UqPpk
https://youtu.be/aaQAl5Vv9Kk
https://youtu.be/v74TyFFegoM

0:00 Challenging laws of thermodynamics with quantum physics 
1:50 Sadi Carn
title: 2nd Law of Thermodynamics Law Challenged by a Tiny Quantum Engine
